title: Dear Us Who Used to be “The Ice Knight and The Failure Princess - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manga   European Ambience   Forced Marriage   Knights   Misunderstandings   Reincarnation   Weak Protagonist
author: Yairo Suzu   八色鈴
description:
“Though I was an unwanted bride, may I fall in love with you again?“

A sickly princess who married a knight who she had a one-sided crush on.

She dreamed of a happy marriage, but reality was cruel.

Scorned by her beloved husband, her mental state weakens, until finally the princess loses her life in the wake of a certain incident.

A dozen or so years later.

A girl suddenly remembers. Her previous life as a pitiful wife who died without having her husband sparing her so much as a glance.

Let’s live peacefully this time. The girl decided to do so, but due to a trick of fate, she ended up working at her ex-husband’s castle.

A count called “Knight of Ice“ and his wife who died and reincarnated without being loved by him. A love story spun by two clumsy people.>
